name: Ditching Work3 -escape game
description:
"Ah, dang, overtime again today?!
...All right, I'm gonna ditch work final!"

Sneakily ditch work without your evil boss noticing in this escape/puzzle game. Can you get out of work in one piece?
Hang in there, you lowly wage slave, don't give up! 30 levels in total. And this round features another special level at the end!
Don’t miss the electrifying end!

●How to play
It's super easy. Just tap anything that looks interesting and use items.
If you get stuck on a puzzle, you can watch a video for hints!
